title: npm run build error
body:
node version 11.14.0
npm version 6.7.0
I installed it successfully, and the log told me:
```ssh
...
Binary found at /mnt/d/users/tanrenyuan/Documents/MyEtherWallet/node_modules/node-sass/vendor/linux-x64-67/binding.node
Testing binary
Binary is fine
npm WARN myetherwallet@5.0.10 No license field.
npm WARN optional SKIPPING OPTIONAL DEPENDENCY: fsevents@1.2.8 (node_modules/fsevents):
npm WARN notsup SKIPPING OPTIONAL DEPENDENCY: Unsupported platform for fsevents@1.2.8: wanted {"os":"darwin","arch":"any"} (current: {"os":"linux","arch":"x64"})
npm WARN optional SKIPPING OPTIONAL DEPENDENCY: fsevents@1.2.7 (node_modules/@myetherwallet/mewconnect-web-client/node_modules/fsevents):
npm WARN notsup SKIPPING OPTIONAL DEPENDENCY: Unsupported platform for fsevents@1.2.7: wanted {"os":"darwin","arch":"any"} (current: {"os":"linux","arch":"x64"})

added 4490 packages from 1929 contributors and audited 844788 packages in 817.443s
found 73 vulnerabilities (65 low, 8 high)
  run `npm audit fix` to fix them, or `npm audit` for details
```

It seems fine, then I run `npm run build` manually, it just failed:
```ssh
> myetherwallet@5.0.10 build /mnt/d/users/tanrenyuan/Documents/MyEtherWallet
> npm run update && vue-cli-service build


> myetherwallet@5.0.10 update /mnt/d/users/tanrenyuan/Documents/MyEtherWallet
> npm run update:packages && npm run update:lists


> myetherwallet@5.0.10 update:packages /mnt/d/users/tanrenyuan/Documents/MyEtherWallet
> node package-test.js

new update found moment-timezone 0.5.24 0.5.25 2019-04-18T06:13:15.919Z
new update found @ledgerhq/hw-app-eth 4.53.0 4.54.0 2019-04-19T07:02:12.488Z
new update found @ledgerhq/hw-transport-u2f 4.53.0 4.54.0 2019-04-19T07:02:24.227Z
new update found stylelint 10.0.0 10.0.1 2019-04-16T09:25:43.284Z
new update found stylelint-config-prettier 5.0.0 5.1.0 2019-04-18T19:42:42.794Z
npm ERR! code ELIFECYCLE
npm ERR! errno 1
npm ERR! myetherwallet@5.0.10 update:packages: `node package-test.js`
npm ERR! Exit status 1
npm ERR!
npm ERR! Failed at the myetherwallet@5.0.10 update:packages script.
npm ERR! This is probably not a problem with npm. There is likely additional logging output above.

npm ERR! A complete log of this run can be found in:
npm ERR!     /home/sintan1071/.npm/_logs/2019-04-28T07_30_41_864Z-debug.log
npm ERR! code ELIFECYCLE
npm ERR! errno 1
npm ERR! myetherwallet@5.0.10 update: `npm run update:packages && npm run update:lists`
npm ERR! Exit status 1
npm ERR!
npm ERR! Failed at the myetherwallet@5.0.10 update script.
npm ERR! This is probably not a problem with npm. There is likely additional logging output above.

npm ERR! A complete log of this run can be found in:
npm ERR!     /home/sintan1071/.npm/_logs/2019-04-28T07_30_41_929Z-debug.log
npm ERR! code ELIFECYCLE
npm ERR! errno 1
npm ERR! myetherwallet@5.0.10 build: `npm run update && vue-cli-service build`
npm ERR! Exit status 1
npm ERR!
npm ERR! Failed at the myetherwallet@5.0.10 build script.
npm ERR! This is probably not a problem with npm. There is likely additional logging output above.

npm ERR! A complete log of this run can be found in:
npm ERR!     /home/sintan1071/.npm/_logs/2019-04-28T07_30_41_984Z-debug.log
```
please give me a little help here,, thanks a lot

Well, I found something, when I run 'npm install', I thought it works fine and the whole process seems OK, but when I look back for more details on the npm-install log, guess what, I just found something error that I didn't find before:
```ssh
...
> bufferutil@4.0.1 install /mnt/d/users/tanrenyuan/Documents/MyEtherWallet/node_modules/@myetherwallet/mewconnect-web-client/node_modules/bufferutil
> node-gyp-build


> wrtc@0.2.1 install /mnt/d/users/tanrenyuan/Documents/MyEtherWallet/node_modules/@myetherwallet/mewconnect-web-client/node_modules/wrtc
> node scripts/install.js

Searching for a pre-built wrtc binary
node-pre-gyp WARN Using request for node-pre-gyp https download
node-pre-gyp ERR! install error
node-pre-gyp ERR! stack Error: 404 status code downloading tarball https://node-webrtc.s3.amazonaws.com/wrtc/v0.2.1/Release/node-v67-linux-x64.tar.gz
node-pre-gyp ERR! stack     at Request.<anonymous> (/mnt/d/users/tanrenyuan/Documents/MyEtherWallet/node_modules/@myetherwallet/mewconnect-web-client/node_modules/node-pre-gyp/lib/install.js:139:27)
```
